se.cbb.jprime.mcmc

Interface Proposal

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MetropolisHastingsProposal

    public interface Proposal
    Interface for detailing a state parameter change initiated by a single Proposer. The entire state change consists of one or possibly more of these objects.
    Author:
    Joel Sj√∂strand.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getNoOfPerturbedParameters()
      Returns the number of parameters which were in fact perturbed (or at least attempted to be perturbed) by the responsible Proposer for this state change.
      int getNoOfPerturbedSubParameters()
      Returns the total number of sub-parameters which were in fact perturbed by the responsible Proposer for this state change.
      java.util.List<StateParameter> getPerturbedParameters()
      Returns a list of all parameters which were in fact perturbed (or at least attempted to be perturbed) by the responsible Proposer for this state change.
      Proposer getProposer()
      Returns the object which did the perturbation which yielded this object.
      boolean isValid()
      Returns true if the proposal is indeed valid.

    • Method Detail

      • getProposer

        Proposer getProposer()
        Returns the object which did the perturbation which yielded this object.
        Returns:
        the responsible proposer.

      • getPerturbedParameters

        java.util.List<StateParameter> getPerturbedParameters()
        Returns a list of all parameters which were in fact perturbed (or at least attempted to be perturbed) by the responsible Proposer for this state change.
        Returns:
        the perturbed parameters.

      • getNoOfPerturbedParameters

        int getNoOfPerturbedParameters()
        Returns the number of parameters which were in fact perturbed (or at least attempted to be perturbed) by the responsible Proposer for this state change.
        Returns:
        the number of perturbed parameters.

      • getNoOfPerturbedSubParameters

        int getNoOfPerturbedSubParameters()
        Returns the total number of sub-parameters which were in fact perturbed by the responsible Proposer for this state change.
        Returns:
        the total number of perturbed sub-parameters.

      • isValid

        boolean isValid()
        Returns true if the proposal is indeed valid.
        Returns:
        true if valid, false if invalid.
